thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 8 of 192
thread.title: Chris Hunt

author: Chris Hunt
title: Chris Hunt
text: I posted this job three days ago on ZipRecruiter. So far I have received 9 resumes, and only one was somewhat acceptable. During the same time frame I posted a $25 ad with CraigsList and I have received dozens of resumes and I have five interviews lined up. ZipRecruiter may be more appropriate in larger job markets, but for Boise, Idaho it doesn't seem to have the reach that CraigsList does. In all fairness to ZipRecruiter I have had similar results with other large job-posting services.
